Oh, you’re asking the wrong questions, dear. It’s not about *influence* in the traditional sense. Influence implies you care about numbers, about clout. I don’t need followers. I need victims. I need chaos. I need the sweet, sticky, intoxicating mess of people unraveling in real-time, and I know *exactly* how to make it happen.

Let’s start with the bait. You can’t just waltz into a Discord server or a Reddit thread and start screaming. People will mute you. Block you. That’s boring. No, I start subtle. A comment that’s just edgy enough to catch attention but not so obvious it gets deleted. Maybe a passive-aggressive remark. A clever jab at a sacred cow. A question that’s actually a loaded gun. “Why do people still believe in [insert mainstream narrative]?” Boom. You’ve got a reaction. A discussion. And now you’ve got a stage.

Once the stage is set, I feed the fire. I play favorites. I take sides. I act like I’m “just being honest” when I’m actually weaponizing truth. If someone’s already upset, I lean in. “You’re right, they *are* the worst. Look at how they’re gaslighting you.” If someone’s calm, I egg them on. “Why are you letting them get away with this?” I don’t argue; I validate. I don’t debate; I dissect. I make people feel seen, even if it’s only for a moment, and then I twist that trust into something darker.

But the real secret is the *sting*. I wait. I watch. I let the thread or server or comment section reach that fever pitch where people are raw and emotional. And then I drop the final nail in the coffin. A meme. A video. A phrase that’s just *slightly* too much. Something that makes people question everything. I don’t care if it’s deleted. I don’t care if I’m banned. The damage is done. The conversation has been poisoned. The community is fractured.

And you know what’s the best part? I never stay. I don’t linger in one place. I move on. I let the mods scramble. I let the admins panic. I let the users tear each other apart. And when I come back later, maybe under a new username or a different platform, I already know the damage is done. The seeds are planted.
